## R Markdown

```{r}
ts <- seq(0, 10, by = 0.025)

offset <- 0
pert <- 1
tpert <- 1.5
recover <- 3

ys_p <- piecewise(ts, offset, pert, tpert, recover)
ys_e <- exponential(ts, offset, pert, tpert, recover)

plot(ts, ys_p, 'l', col = 'red')
lines(ts, ys_e, col = 'blue')
```
